DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate eccentric training intervention lateral epicondylalgia ( tennis elbow ) clinical setting .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Eccentric Training Patients With Lateral Epicondylalgia
DOC.criteria: Positive diagnostic criterion accord Haker ( 1991 ) : A history pain around lateral epicondyle least one month . Pain palpation lateral epicondyle humerus positive result two follow three pain provocation test : Middle finger test , resist extension wrist , Vigorimeter test . Each test describe detail Haker ( 1991 ) Subjects rheumatoid arthritis Fibromyalgia Previous surgery elbow region Neck dysfunction suggest possible cervical rhizopathy Entrapment n.radialis Patients ongoing treatment , previous treatment less three month enrol study .
